SerializableParameter.Name: nform
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of input columns in PRMS Data File used to specify form of precipitation (0 if no form data,

SerializableParameter.Name: ngwcell
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of MODFLOW finite-difference cells in a layer (includes active and inactive cells)

SerializableParameter.Name: ndays
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum number of days in a year

SerializableParameter.Name: nhrucell
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of unique intersections between gravity reservoirs in PRMS soil zone and MODFLOW finitedifference cells

SerializableParameter.Name: nrain
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of measurement stations that measure precipitation

SerializableParameter.Name: ntemp
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of measurement stations that measure air temperature

SerializableParameter.Name: one
SerializableParameter.Description: A constant

SerializableParameter.Name: ncascade
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of cascade paths associated with HRUs

SerializableParameter.Name: ngw
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of PRMS ground-water reservoirs (used in PRMS-only simulations)

SerializableParameter.Name: nsfres
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of on-channel detainment reservoirs (used in PRMS-only simulations)

SerializableParameter.Name: nhru
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of HRUs

SerializableParameter.Name: ndepl
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of snow-depletion curves used for snowmelt calculations

SerializableParameter.Name: nsegment
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of stream segments

SerializableParameter.Name: nsol
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of measurement stations that measure solar radiation

SerializableParameter.Name: ndeplval
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of snow-depletion values for each snow-depletion curve

SerializableParameter.Name: ncascdgw
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of cascade paths associated with PRMS ground-water reservoirs

SerializableParameter.Name: nobs
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of streamflow-gaging stations

SerializableParameter.Name: nssr
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of PRMS subsurface reservoirs (must be specified equal to nhru)

SerializableParameter.Name: nreach
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of stream reaches on all stream segments

SerializableParameter.Name: nmonths
SerializableParameter.Description: Number of months in a year

SerializableParameter.Name: elev_units
SerializableParameter.Description: Units of altitude (0=feet; 1=meters)

SerializableParameter.Name: soil_type
SerializableParameter.Description: Soil type in HRU (1=sand; 2=loam;

SerializableParameter.Name: tmax_allrain
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly minimum air temperature at an

SerializableParameter.Name: radj_wppt
SerializableParameter.Description: Precipitation-day adjustment factor tosolar radiation for a winter day withprecipitation greater than ppt_rad_adjas a decimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: adjmix_rain
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly rain adjustment factor for amixed precipitation event (usually1.0)

SerializableParameter.Name: carea_max
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum possible area contributingto surface runoff, expressed as adecimal fraction of HRU area

SerializableParameter.Name: transp_beg
SerializableParameter.Description: Begin month for transpirationcomputations at HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_lat
SerializableParameter.Description: Latitude of HRU centroid

SerializableParameter.Name: rad_trncf
SerializableParameter.Description: Transmission coefficient for short-wave radiation through winter plant canopyon an HRU as a decimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_area
SerializableParameter.Description: Area of HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: smidx_exp
SerializableParameter.Description: Exponent in non-linear contributingarea algorithm

SerializableParameter.Name: covden_win
SerializableParameter.Description: Winter plant cover density for plant type as a decimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: szconverge
SerializableParameter.Description: Convergence criterion for checking soil-zone states that is specified as the smallest change in gravity drainage

SerializableParameter.Name: pmn_mo
SerializableParameter.Description: Mean monthly precipitation at base and lapse stations

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_psta
SerializableParameter.Description: Identifier of measurement station usedas base in calculating precipitationlapse rate

SerializableParameter.Name: srain_intcp
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum summer rain storage in the plant canopy for plant type on HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: mxsziter
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum iterations for computing soil-zone flow to finite-difference cells during atime step

SerializableParameter.Name: snowinfil_max
SerializableParameter.Description: Daily maximum snowmelt infiltration for the HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: melt_force
SerializableParameter.Description: Julian date to force snowmelt. Julian day to force the use of the isothermal form of the snowpack energy equation. This date should always be later than melt_look, varies by region, and is dependent on the persistence of the snowpack.

SerializableParameter.Name: epan_coef
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly pan evaporation coefficientused to convert value to potentialevapotranspiration

SerializableParameter.Name: gwflow_coef
SerializableParameter.Description: ground-water routing coefficient. The coefficient is multiplied by the storage in the ground-water reservoir to calculate ground-water flow computation to downslope HRUs and(or) to streamflow.

SerializableParameter.Name: den_max
SerializableParameter.Description: Average maximum snowpack density as a decimal fraction of the liquid water equivalent

SerializableParameter.Name: temp_units
SerializableParameter.Description: Units of measured air temperature (0=degrees Fahrenheit; 1=degreesCelsius)

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_plaps
SerializableParameter.Description: Identifier of lapse measurement station used in calculating precipitation lapse rate

SerializableParameter.Name: gw_strmseg_down_id
SerializableParameter.Description: Identification number of stream segment in PRMS that receives cascading flow from aground-water reservoir.

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_percent_imperv
SerializableParameter.Description: Decimal fraction of HRU area that isimpervious

SerializableParameter.Name: runoff_units
SerializableParameter.Description: Units of measured streamflows written in PRMS Water-Budget File (0=cubic feet per second; 1=cubic meters per second)

SerializableParameter.Name: jh_coef_hru
SerializableParameter.Description: Air temperature coefficient used in Jensen-Haise potentialevapotranspiration equation for eachHRU

SerializableParameter.Name: snow_intcp
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum snow storage in the plantcanopy for plant type on HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: dday_intcp
SerializableParameter.Description: Intercept of monthly degree-day totemperature relation

SerializableParameter.Name: jh_coef
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly air temperature coefficientused in Jensen-Haise potentialevapotranspiration equation

SerializableParameter.Name: print_objfunc
SerializableParameter.Description: Objective function output in PRMS WaterBudget File (0=no; 1=yes)

SerializableParameter.Name: potet_sublim
SerializableParameter.Description: Fraction of potential evapotranspirationsublimated from snow surface as adecimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: pmo
SerializableParameter.Description: Month for which monthly summaryis written to PRMS Water-Budget(0=no monthly summary; 1=January,2=February, and so forth)

SerializableParameter.Name: ssr2gw_exp
SerializableParameter.Description: Exponent in the equation used tocompute gravity drainage toPRMS ground-water reservoir orMODFLOW finite-difference cell

SerializableParameter.Name: ssstor_init
SerializableParameter.Description: Initial storage in PRMS subsurfacereservoir or gravity reservoir

SerializableParameter.Name: gw_pct_up
SerializableParameter.Description: Fraction of outflow from a ground-water reservoir to be added as inflow to a ground-waterreservoir or stream segment

SerializableParameter.Name: soil2gw_max
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum value of soil-water excessrouted directly to PRMS groundwater reservoir

SerializableParameter.Name: objfunc_q
SerializableParameter.Description: Streamflow-gaging station used in objectivefunction calculations

SerializableParameter.Name: sat_threshold
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum volume of water per unitarea in the soil zone (set to 999.0for infinite volume)

SerializableParameter.Name: gvr_cell_pct
SerializableParameter.Description: Decimal fraction of HRU area associated witha finite-difference cell

SerializableParameter.Name: soil_rechr_init
SerializableParameter.Description: Initial value in capillary reservoirwhere evaporation and transpirationcan occur simultaneously (valuemust be less than or equal tosoil_moist_max)

SerializableParameter.Name: gvr_hru_pct
SerializableParameter.Description: Decimal fraction of HRU areaassociated with gravity reservoir

SerializableParameter.Name: tsta_elev
SerializableParameter.Description: Altitude of the air temperature measurementstation

SerializableParameter.Name: covden_sum
SerializableParameter.Description: Summer plant canopy density as adecimal fraction of the HRU area

SerializableParameter.Name: tmax_allsnow
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly maximum air temperature atwhich precipitation is all snow forthe HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: pref_flow_den
SerializableParameter.Description: Decimal fraction of the soil zoneavailable for preferential flow

SerializableParameter.Name: gwsink_coef
SerializableParameter.Description: Linear coefficient to route water in ground-waterreservoir to ground-water sink

SerializableParameter.Name: wrain_intcp
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum winter rain storage in theplant canopy for plant type on HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: tstorm_mo
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly storm prevalence (0=frontalstorms prevalent; 1=convectivestorms prevalent)

SerializableParameter.Name: lake_hru_id
SerializableParameter.Description: MODFLOW lake number associated with an HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: gvr_hru_id
SerializableParameter.Description: HRU associated with a gravity reservoir

SerializableParameter.Name: print_freq
SerializableParameter.Description: Frequency of output written in PRMS WaterBudget File (0=none; 1=simulation totals;2=yearly; 4=monthly; 8=daily; or additivecombinationsâ€”for example, use 3 for outputof yearly and simulation totals)

SerializableParameter.Name: cascade_tol
SerializableParameter.Description: Minimum contributing area of an upslope HRU considered for flow to a downslope HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: smidx_coef
SerializableParameter.Description: Coefficient in non-linear contributing area algorithm

SerializableParameter.Name: transp_end
SerializableParameter.Description: Last month for transpirationcomputations at HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: radadj_intcp
SerializableParameter.Description: Intercept of solar radiation adjustmentto temperature

SerializableParameter.Name: snarea_curve
SerializableParameter.Description: Snow area-depletion curve values, 11for each curve as a decimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: gvr_cell_id
SerializableParameter.Description: Finite-difference cell associated with a gravityreservoir

SerializableParameter.Name: albset_snm
SerializableParameter.Description: Minimum snow fall, in waterequivalent, needed to reset snowalbedo when snowpack is melting asa decimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: basin_tsta
SerializableParameter.Description: Identifier of measurement station used incomputing air temperature

SerializableParameter.Name: albset_rna
SerializableParameter.Description: Decimal fraction of rain in a mixed rainand snow event above which snowalbedo is not reset (applied whensnowpack is accumulating)

SerializableParameter.Name: cov_type
SerializableParameter.Description: Plant cover type for HRU (0=bare soil;1=grasses; 2=shrubs; 3=trees)

SerializableParameter.Name: dday_slope
SerializableParameter.Description: Slope of monthly degree-day totemperature relation

SerializableParameter.Name: radadj_slope
SerializableParameter.Description: Slope of solar radiation adjustment totemperature

SerializableParameter.Name: psta_elev
SerializableParameter.Description: Land surface altitude of base andlapse stations

SerializableParameter.Name: cascade_flg
SerializableParameter.Description: Flag used to force outflow from an upslope HRU to be added as inflow to one downslope HRU. A zero allows for multiple routing of inflows and outflows among HRUs and a value of one forces routing from an upslope HRU to one downslope HRU thathas the greatest fraction of contributing area in the upslope HRU.

SerializableParameter.Name: basin_area
SerializableParameter.Description: Total area of watershed

SerializableParameter.Name: albset_sna
SerializableParameter.Description: Minimum snow fall, in waterequivalent, needed to resetsnow albedo when snowpack isaccumulating as a decimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: fastcoef_lin
SerializableParameter.Description: Linear flow-routing coefficient for fast interflow

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_deplcrv
SerializableParameter.Description: Identifier of snowpack areal-depletioncurve for HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: albset_rnm
SerializableParameter.Description: Decimal fraction of rain in a mixed rainand snow event above which snowalbedo is not reset (applied whensnowpack is melting)

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_elev
SerializableParameter.Description: Mean land-surface altitude of HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: emis_noppt
SerializableParameter.Description: Emissivity of air on days withoutprecipitation

SerializableParameter.Name: fastcoef_sq
SerializableParameter.Description: Non-linear flow-routing coefficient forfast interflow

SerializableParameter.Name: id_obsrunoff
SerializableParameter.Description: Identifier for streamflow-gaging station

SerializableParameter.Name: moyrsum
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly and yearly summaries for eachHRU (0 for no summaries; 1 forsummaries)

SerializableParameter.Name: gwstor_init
SerializableParameter.Description: Initial storage in ground-water reservoir

SerializableParameter.Name: soil_rechr_max
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum quantity of water in thecapillary reservoir (value must be lessthan or equal to soil_moist_max)

SerializableParameter.Name: slowcoef_sq
SerializableParameter.Description: Non-linear flow-routing coefficient forslow interflow

SerializableParameter.Name: ssrmax_coef
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum amount of gravity drainageto PRMS ground-water reservoir orMODFLOW finite-difference cell

SerializableParameter.Name: den_init
SerializableParameter.Description: Density of new-fallen snow as adecimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_slope
SerializableParameter.Description: Slope of HRU, specified as change invertical length divided by change inhorizontal length

SerializableParameter.Name: tmin_adj
SerializableParameter.Description: Minimum daily HRU temperatureadjustment factor, which is estimated onthe basis of slope and aspect

SerializableParameter.Name: melt_look
SerializableParameter.Description: Julian date to start looking for whensnowmelt begins

SerializableParameter.Name: radj_sppt
SerializableParameter.Description: Precipitation-day adjustment factor tosolar radiation for a summer day withprecipitation greater than ppt_rad_adjas a decimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: print_type
SerializableParameter.Description: Type of output written in PRMS Water-BudgetFile (0=measured and predicted flow only;1=water balance table; 2=detailed output)

SerializableParameter.Name: soil_moist_init
SerializableParameter.Description: Initial value of available water in thecapillary reservoir

SerializableParameter.Name: imperv_stor_max
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum retention storage for HRUimpervious area

SerializableParameter.Name: freeh2o_cap
SerializableParameter.Description: Free-water holding capacity ofsnowpack expressed as decimalfraction of total snowpack waterequivalent

SerializableParameter.Name: settle_const
SerializableParameter.Description: Snowpack settlement-time constant

SerializableParameter.Name: gw_down_id
SerializableParameter.Description: Identification number of downslope ground-water reservoir.

SerializableParameter.Name: padj_sn
SerializableParameter.Description: Mean monthly factor to adjust snowlapse rate computed betweenstation_psta andstation_plaps (positive factorsare used as multipliers and negativefactors are made positive andsubstituted for the computed lapserate)

SerializableParameter.Name: ssr2gw_rate
SerializableParameter.Description: Linear coefficient in the equationused to compute gravity drainageto PRMS ground-water reservoir orMODFLOW finite-difference cell

SerializableParameter.Name: ppt_rad_adj
SerializableParameter.Description: Precipitation threshold used to determineif solar radiation is adjusted for cloudcover.

SerializableParameter.Name: slowcoef_lin
SerializableParameter.Description: Linear flow-routing coefficient forslow interflow

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_aspect
SerializableParameter.Description: Aspect of HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_tlaps
SerializableParameter.Description: Identifier of lapse measurement station usedfor air-temperature lapse rate calculations

SerializableParameter.Name: cecn_coef
SerializableParameter.Description: Monthly convection-condensationenergy coefficient

SerializableParameter.Name: soil_moist_max
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum available capillary waterholding capacity of soil zone in an HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: transp_tmax
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum temperature used to determine when transpiration begins in an HRU

SerializableParameter.Name: snarea_thresh
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum water equivalent threshold,water equivalent in an HRU less thanthreshold results in use of snowcovered-area curve

SerializableParameter.Name: radmax
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum fraction of potential solarradiation that reaches land surface as adecimal fraction

SerializableParameter.Name: tmax_adj
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum daily HRU temperatureadjustment factor, which is estimated onthe basis of slope and aspect

SerializableParameter.Name: gw_up_id
SerializableParameter.Description: Identification number of upslope ground-water reservoir.

SerializableParameter.Name: precip_units
SerializableParameter.Description: Specify units of precipitation (0=inches;1=millimeters)

SerializableParameter.Name: padj_rn
SerializableParameter.Description: Mean monthly factor to adjust rainlapse rate computed betweenstation_psta andstation_plaps when precipitationis rain (positive factors are used asmultipliers and negative factors aremade positive and substituted for thecomputed lapse rate)

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_type
SerializableParameter.Description: Type of HRU (0=inactive; 1=land;2=lake)

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_tsta
SerializableParameter.Description: Identifier of the measurement station usedto compute HRU daily maximum andminimum air temperatures

SerializableParameter.Name: tmax_index
SerializableParameter.Description: Maximum monthly air temperatureused to adjust solar radiation forprecipitation

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_up_id
SerializableParameter.Description: Identification number of upslope HRU.

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_down_id
SerializableParameter.Description: Identification number of downslope HRU.

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_strmseg_down_id
SerializableParameter.Description: Identification number of stream segment that receives inflow from an upslope HRU.

SerializableParameter.Name: hru_pct_up
SerializableParameter.Description: Fraction of outflow from upslope HRU to be added as inflow to a downslope HRU or streamsegment
